channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server Database Administration Tip a Day Series
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: You should probably add the links to the tips in here as you add them..in other words today you would have 3 links when you publish tip # 3
item.content:encoded: You should probably add the links to the tips in here as you add them..in other words today you would have 3 links when you publish tip # 3

item.title: By: Dugi
item.dc:creator: Dugi
item.description: A great job from you Ted, I'm looking forward for your tips here whenever you post them, and I know that they will have some selected resources and will be very useful to the SQL Community!
item.content:encoded: A great job from you Ted, I’m looking forward for your tips here whenever you post them, and I know that they will have some selected resources and will be very useful to the SQL Community!

item.description: I was thinking the same, Eli. Would fit nice directly into the Admin section. Thanks, I will do it.<br /> <br />
item.content:encoded: I was thinking the same, Eli. Would fit nice directly into the Admin section. Thanks, I will do it.
